lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.analyzer
Class ClassDirectoryWalker

java.lang.Object
  lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.analyzer.ClassDirectoryWalker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassWalker
public class ClassDirectoryWalker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassWalker

Utility class used to walk through classes from a directory hierarchy containing either .class files or .jar files. One or more ClassWalkListener could be associated to this class to perform actions on the walked classes. Processed files may be selected using includes and excludes patterns. SCM files are always excluded. This class is basically a wrapper over a DirectoryWalker to walk over classes contained in .class or .jar files walked by the underlying DirectoryWalker.

Constructor Summary

          Contructs an instance of ClassWalker, wrapping a DirectoryWalker with default SCM exclusions.
